Experience

Redstamp Digital Agency

Created custom WordPress themes, features, bugfixes, email templates and performance improvements for SaaS companies such as:

RewardStream

I worked as a Full Stack Developer at RewardStream, a referral marketing SaaS company, and had the opportunity to design and implement features used by companies such as:

Cameron Sparling Photography

A responsive portfolio made for fashion photographer Cameron Sparling. This project taught me about UI/UX, hosting with Amazon S3, setting up a private email, designing for a client, SEO and responsive design.

Syncline

A tool aimed at geotechnical engineers to streamline the process of collecting, reviewing and approving site investigation information. This is an early proof of concept developed as a final project at Lighthouse Labs. This was a team project developed over the course of two weeks. This project taught me about designing a database schema, writing detailed user stories, creating a secure app with Ruby on Rails, JavaScript animations, git branching in a team environment, and using external APIs.
